scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Papers and Ephemera series, 1980-1983, undated, comprises zine fliers, a Fleshtones concert poster at a Lexington venue, record store paper bags, and a note left for Keith Coleman, and couple of illustrations. The fliers advertise Lexington Lost zine and what record stores the zine can be purchased at. The fliers are hand drawn after copied.
